articles.author: Stephen Clark
articles.title: Two lunar landers are on the way to the Moon after SpaceX’s double moonshot - Ars Technica
articles.description: The landers were developed by Texas-based Firefly Aerospace and a Japanese startup named ispace.

articles.author: Samuel Axon
articles.title: Civilization VII preview: A new age for a storied franchise - Ars Technica
articles.description: 15 hours in, it seems like an improvement on Civilization VI’s missteps.

articles.author: Rebecca Falconer
articles.title: Biden warns against extreme wealth and rise of "tech industrial complex" in farewell address - Axios
articles.description: He warned of "dangerous consequences" if a "concentration of power in the hands of a very few ultra-wealthy people" goes unchecked.
articles.content: President Biden in his farewell address to the nation on Wednesday took aim at Big Tech and warned of "dangerous consequences" if a "concentration of power in the hands of a very few ultra-wealthy pe… [+1430 chars]
